root: ^C'mere? Am I a dog or something?
^Come on don't get so worked up hahaha.
^I'll just pretend I didn't hear that...
^Anyways, do you know where this is? I got lost.
^You got... lost? And ended up here? Are you stupid? How did you even pass by the security?
^What? Are you a showman or somthing? To ease the nerves I mean.
^No, im not, my name is Yasuhiro and im a fortune teller.
^A fortune teller? You mean a scammer?
^Just kidding, im not, im right 30% of the times!
^Hey can you stop juding me with your sight? Its getting kinda cold in here...
^Dont scream! The acoustic here is... loud?
^Fine fine!! Just stop screaming you moron!
^A tantrum is the only thing you need to get what you want!
^(He totally looks and acts like a reddit manchild)
^So you don't know what this is?
^I can't believe you got involved in a thing like this without even knowing what was about.
^It's like a hummm... Musical battle royal killing game?
^We fight in a 1v1 musical battle and only one can remain alive, the losers will get executed.
^Stop joking around hahahaha... What kind of spooky bear would plan somthing like that?
^(Bear? He got the game wrong but well said anyways)
^Anyways, believe whatever you want here's the flyer though...
^(He's a slow reader, spare him a minute)
